DOC.detailed_description: In eight-week open label outpatient pilot trial , evaluate safety , tolerability , potential utility LDX treatment cocaine dependence . Patients receive flexible-fixed dosing schedule open-label condition . Patients titrate tolerate dose two week period , maximum 140mg daily , maintain high tolerate dose four week , follow two week run-down period . All participant receive medication management counsel individual therapy use structure compliance enhancement manual design pharmacotherapy trial subject substance use disorder . The primary outcome measure 1 ) maximum total lisdexamfetamine dose achieve study period define high amount medication per day maintain seven day period 2 ) lisdexamfetamine tolerability measure adverse effect report Systematic Assessment Treatment Emergent Events ( SAFTEE ) .
